services.sectionSubtitle: From strategy to execution, we deliver digital services that elevate your business and amplify your presence online.
services.web-design-description: We design and develop sophisticated, responsive websites that captivate your audience and reflect your brand's unique identity.

process.sectionSubtitle: A balanced approach combining human creativity with AI-enhanced precision

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: We begin by understanding your business, goals, target audience, and challenges through in-depth research to establish a solid foundation for your project.

steps.title: Strategy
steps.description: Using human insights enhanced by AI analysis, we develop a comprehensive strategy that outlines the approach, features, and technologies for your digital solution.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our designers blend creativity with AI assistance to create wireframes and visual designs that align with your brand identity and provide an exceptional user experience.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: Our development team brings designs to life, leveraging both human expertise and AI tools to build responsive, high-performance digital solutions with clean, efficient code.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: After thorough testing and your approval, we deploy your solution and ensure everything is functioning perfectly through automated and manual verification.

steps.title: Growth
steps.description: We provide ongoing support and continuous optimization to help your digital presence evolve and continue driving business results.

about.subTitle: We blend human creativity with AI technology to create digital experiences that matter.
about.ourStorySubTitle: Where human creativity meets AI innovation to create digital experiences that matter
about.ourStoryp1: Soluvia was founded with a vision to bridge the gap between human creativity and artificial intelligence. We believe that the future of design lies in this harmony – where human intuition and AI capabilities amplify each other.
about.ourStoryp2: Our approach combines the irreplaceable human touch – empathy, creativity, and strategic thinking – with the efficiency and analytical power of AI technologies. This unique blend allows us to deliver solutions that are both innovative and authentic.
about.ourStoryp3: Today, we're proud to work with clients across various industries, from startups to established enterprises, helping them achieve their goals through our human-driven, AI-enhanced creative process.
about.ourCoreValuesSubTitle: Our values are at the heart of everything we do

values.title: Human Creativity
values.description: We believe in the power of human creativity, intuition, and the emotional intelligence that only people can provide.

values.title: AI Augmentation
values.description: We leverage AI technologies to enhance human capabilities, automate repetitive tasks, and provide data-driven insights.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly explore new ideas, technologies, and methodologies to deliver cutting-edge solutions for our clients.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of partnership – between humans and AI, as well as with our clients and within our team.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from design to implementation to client service.

values.title: Adaptability
values.description: We embrace change and continuously evolve our approach to stay at the forefront of design and technology.

faq.sectionSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and process

questions.question: What services does Soluvia offer ?
questions.answer: Soluvia offers a comprehensive range of digital services including web design, web development, AI automation, SEO optimization, content management systems, and e-commerce solutions. We create sophisticated, elegant websites that drive business growth and optimize your online presence.

questions.question: How does your pricing work ?
questions.answer: Our pricing is completely transparent. It includes a one-time setup fee (starting from €999 for essential projects), along with a custom monthly maintenance fee tailored to your specific needs. The final cost depends on several factors, such as the number of pages, required features, and level of customization. Each package is built to ensure you only pay for what your business truly needs.

questions.question: What is your design and development process ?
questions.answer: Our process begins with a discovery phase where we learn about your business, goals, and target audience. We then create wireframes and prototypes, followed by visual design. After your approval, we proceed to development, testing, and launch. Throughout the process, we maintain open communication and seek your feedback at key milestones.

questions.question: How can AI automation benefit my business ?
questions.answer: Our AI automation solutions can streamline your workflow by automating repetitive tasks, enhancing customer interactions, analyzing data patterns, and providing valuable business insights. This leads to improved efficiency, reduced operational costs, and the ability to focus your team's efforts on strategic growth initiatives.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete a website project ?
questions.answer: The timeline depends on your project's complexity and scope. A standard website typically takes 3-5 weeks, while more complex projects with custom functionality or e-commerce integration may take 8-12 weeks. During our initial consultation, we'll provide a more accurate timeline based on your specific requirements.

questions.question: What is your payment process?
questions.answer: We require a 50% deposit to begin work, with the remaining balance due upon project completion. For larger projects, we can arrange a payment schedule with milestones.

questions.question: Do you work with clients remotely ?
questions.answer: Yes, we collaborate effectively with clients globally using our digital workflow and communication tools. We schedule meetings at convenient times across different time zones to ensure smooth communication throughout your project.

instagramAutomation.title: Instagram Automation
instagramAutomation.description: Automate your Instagram engagement with AI-powered comment replies and direct message responses. Save time while maintaining authentic connections with your audience.
howItWorks: The automation listens to your Instagram webhooks for new comments.
Smart, context-aware replies are generated instantly by the AI.
It automatically replies to a comment and sends a custom DM to the user.
You can customize the AI model and parameters to fit your needs.
instagramAutomation.customSolution: Our team can help you create a fully customized AI automation solution tailored specifically to your business requirements and workflows.
